page.title: 14Janet Dix Theatre School
page.content: The{Janet Dix Theatre School}started in 1980.It was formed by Mrs. Janet Dix. Mrs.Dix not only has a Theatre School in{Immingham}but also in Caistor and Ulceby. Including the two other schools, there are approx. 200 pupils.The school is for over 5's but Janet Dix is hoping to start teaching under 3's as soon as she can accommodate them.Janet doesn't only do ballet but disco, modern dancing and tap.Each lesson costs 75p and most start at around 5.00pm and sometimes for adult dancers at 10.00pm. The Theatre School puts on musicals at Christmas,Easter and occassional shows that correspond with school holidays. The costumes are made by the parents and the practices are held at the Barbarah Garth Community Centre. (By Matthew Walker and Andrew and Lee Etherington)
